name: Irritrollife
0: ”Alexa ask Irritrol Life to list controllers”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: irritrol life
Developer Terms of Use
des: Use Alexa to control the main functions of your Irritrol Life control unit in order to water your garden easily and efficiently. You can ask it to start an irrigation cycle, to stop irrigation when necessary, to list the active programs or the open valves and much more besides.
